paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on BRCA2 variants, including penetrance data and individual records.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: In addition, we show that the predictive power of the BOADICEA risk-prediction model and the Manchester Scoring System was significantly better for BRCA1 than BRCA2.
In addition, we show that the predictive power of the BOADICEA risk-prediction model and the Manchester Scoring System was significantly better for BRCA1 than BRCA2.

functional_data.summary: The functional impact of the c.490delCT variant is associated with breast cancer.

variants.segregation_data: Yes, found in two unrelated families.
variants.additional_notes: This variant was found in two unrelated individuals.
key_quotes: Mutation detection led to the discovery of 27 deleterious mutations in 28 breast cancer patients (14 in BRCA1 and 13 in BRCA2).

tables_processed.table_caption: Deleterious mutations including frame-shift, nonsense and splice site deleterious mutations identified in Malaysian breast cancer patients

extraction_metadata.notes: Extracted all relevant data on BRCA2 variants and penetrance.
